titles.title: A joint resolution to express the approval of Congress of the site on the Clinch River in the Roane County portion of Oak Ridge, Tennessee for a monitored retrievable storage facility, with respect to which a notice of disapproval was submitted by the Governor of the state of Tennessee and the Legislature of the State of Tennessee on May 29, 1987.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 6/2/1987--Introduced. Expresses the approval of the Congress regarding a site on the Clinch River in the Roane County portion of Oak Ridge, Tennessee, for a monitored retrievable storage facility which had been disapproved by the Governor and State Legislature of Tennessee.
